skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ninja facts
des:
Updated Frequently! Get the skinny on your favorite Fortnite Twitch Streamer, Ninja! From common facts like his real name, to obscure lesser known facts. Ask the Ninja Facts skill to learn more about the now famous Twitch Fortnite Streamer Ninja!

The more you ask, the more you learn!

We'll continue to update with the latest and greatest Ninja facts too. Some be sure to check back for more fun Ninja Facts!

We declare no affiliation, sponsorship, partnerships, endorsements, or in any way affiliated with Ninja. Any product names, logos, brands, and other trademarks or images featured or referred to within are the property of their respective trademark holders.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
